item.title: First impressions on Clojure
item.description: Has been 3 weeks that I’m learning Clojure. Here I will dedicate myself to putting posts about what I’m thinking of Clojure. Beforehand I wanna make clear that this series is by the vision of a person that has never worked with a functional language and has never heard about LISP or his dialects. Keep in mind that the languages that I feel comfortable with (not expert) are Javascript, PHP, and Python.
